name: Planet X (Zerby1234567890)
description:
A new planet for humans to get a fresh start yet unbeknownst to them was already inhabited by other life forms alien to them in every way. A singular soldier stepped forward to protect their people and stop the "Aliens" from attacking them.

Controls: 

W - Up,   A - Left,   S - Down,   D - Right.

Left Mouse Click - Fire Laser, Mouse Move Any - Aim.

Made by:

John Kerstetter - Programming

Eli Schillinger - Graphic Design

Collyn Zerby - Sound
